Subject: Re: [junit] Is JUnit Internationalized?
From: Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@...>

> Has anyone translated the strings in JUnit?  What was involved?

I don't think that it was done and I was wondering if an internationalized JUnit can add much value.  A nice to have but certainly not a top priority.

It could be interesting to know if people find it difficult to use JUnit because of the language.  To evangelize, you sometimes have to speak the language of your listeners :-)

If the internationalization is decided I can provide a French translation.

-Vladimir
subject: Re: [junit] Is JUnit Internationalized?
